# thunder_cgnv6_fixed_nat_alg_esp (Resource)

`thunder_cgnv6_fixed_nat_alg_esp`: Change Fixed NAT ESP ALG Settings

## Example Usage

```terraform

  address  = var.dut9049

  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_cgnv6_fixed_nat_alg_esp" "thunder_cgnv6_fixed_nat_alg_esp" {
  sampling_enable {
    counters1 = "all"

}
```
